plot: "This picture was taken during the mobilization of the army in the South, at the opening of the Spanish-American War. This regiment is made up of cowboys and rough riders from the West. Shown on parade."
title: Col. Torrey's 'Rough Riders'
plot_es: "This picture was taken during the mobilization of the army in the South, at the opening of the Spanish-American War. This regiment is made up of cowboys and rough riders from the West. Shown on parade."
